languages.text: {n}Шумно втянув воздух, Ульфар ворчит:{/n} "Чую, недоброй была их смерть. Души Голодных неспокойны, они все еще здесь, на бранном поле, а не со Всеотцом. Я должен проводить их к нему. Засвидетельствуешь ли ты последнюю почесть, отданную моим братьям?"

{n}Heaving in a breath, Ulfar mutters,{/n} "I sense evil in their deaths. The souls of the Baleful Howl are not at rest, but remain here on the battlefield. They are not with the Allfather. I must escort them to him. Will you bear witness to the last honour given to my brothers?"
languages.original_text: {n}Шумно втянув воздух, Ульфар ворчит:{/n} "Чую, недоброй была их смерть. Души Голодных неспокойны, они все еще здесь, на бранном поле, а не со Всеотцом. Я должен проводить их к нему. Засвидетельствуешь ли ты последнюю почесть, отданную моим братьям?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heaving in a breath, Ulfar mutters,{/n} "I sense evil in their deaths. The souls of the Famehungry are not at rest, but remain here on the battlefield. They are not with the Allfather. I must escort them to Him. Will you bear witness to the last honour given to my brothers?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heaving in a breath, Ulfar mutters,{/n} "I sense evil in their deaths. The souls of the Famehungry are not at rest, but remain here on the battlefield. They are not with the Allfather. I must escort them to Him. Will you bear witness to the last honour given to my brothers?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heaving in a breath, Ulfar mutters,{/n} "I sense evil in their deaths. The souls of the Famehungry are not at rest, but remain here on the battlefield. They are not with the Allfather. I must escort them to Him. Will you bear witness to the last honour given to my brothers?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heaving in a breath, Ulfar mutters,{/n} "I sense evil in their deaths. The souls of the Baleful Howl are not at rest, but remain here on the battlefield. They are not with the Allfather. I must escort them to him. Will you bear witness to the last honour given to my brothers?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法深吸一口气，喃喃自语道。{/n}“我从他们的死亡之中感觉到了邪恶。怒嚎者的灵魂并没有安息，而是留在了战场上。他们不在全父身边，我必须护送他们前往英灵神殿。你愿意见证我的兄弟们最后的荣耀吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heaving in a breath, Ulfar mutters,{/n} "I sense evil in their deaths. The souls of the Baleful Howl are not at rest, but remain here on the battlefield. They are not with the Allfather. I must escort them to him. Will you bear witness to the last honour given to my brothers?"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法深吸一口气，喃喃自语道。{/n}“我从他们的死亡之中感觉到了邪恶。渴名者的灵魂并没有安息，而是留在了战场上。他们不在全父身边，我必须护送他们前往英灵神殿。你愿意见证我的兄弟们最后的荣耀吗？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}一息吐いて、ウルファーはつぶやく。{/n}「同胞の死には悪意を感じる。破滅の咆哮の魂は安らかな眠りを迎えることなく、この戦場に留まっている。全知の父と共にいない。俺にはこいつらを父の元まで護衛する義務がある。我が同胞が授かる最後の栄誉を、証言してくれないか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heaving in a breath, Ulfar mutters,{/n} "I sense evil in their deaths. The souls of the Baleful Howl are not at rest, but remain here on the battlefield. They are not with the Allfather. I must escort them to him. Will you bear witness to the last honour given to my brothers?"

traits.locale_text: {n}一息吐いて、ウルファーはつぶやく。{/n}「同胞の死には悪意を感じる。破滅の咆哮の魂は安らかな眠りを迎えることなく、この戦場に留まっている。全知の父と共にいない。俺にはこいつらを父の元まで護衛する義務がある。我が同胞が授かる最後の栄誉を、証言してくれないか？」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Respirando profundamente, Ulfar murmura:{/n} «Siento la maldad en sus muertes. Las almas del Aullido Torvo no descansan, sino que permanecen aquí, en el campo de batalla. No están con el Padre de todas las cosas. Debo escoltarles hasta su presencia. ¿Será testigo del último honor rendido a mis hermanos?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heaving in a breath, Ulfar mutters,{/n} "I sense evil in their deaths. The souls of the Baleful Howl are not at rest, but remain here on the battlefield. They are not with the Allfather. I must escort them to him. Will you bear witness to the last honour given to my brothers?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Respirando profundamente, Ulfar murmura:{/n} «Siento la maldad en sus muertes. Las almas de los Hambrientos de Fama no descansan, sino que permanecen aquí, en el campo de batalla. No están con el Padre de todas las cosas. Debo escoltarles hasta su presencia. ¿Será testigo del último honor rendido a mis hermanos?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar prend une profonde inspiration et marmonne :{/n} « Leur mort porte le sceau du mal. Les âmes des Hurleurs sanguinaires n'ont pas trouvé le repos, mais hantent encore ce champ de bataille, incapables de rejoindre le Père de Tous. Je dois les escorter jusqu'à Lui. Accepteriez-vous de vous faire le témoin du dernier hommage rendu à mes frères ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heaving in a breath, Ulfar mutters,{/n} "I sense evil in their deaths. The souls of the Baleful Howl are not at rest, but remain here on the battlefield. They are not with the Allfather. I must escort them to him. Will you bear witness to the last honour given to my brothers?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar prend une profonde inspiration et marmonne :{/n} « Leur mort porte le sceau du mal. Les âmes des Dévoreurs de gloire n'ont pas trouvé le repos, mais hantent encore ce champ de bataille, incapables de rejoindre le Père de Tous. Je dois les escorter jusqu'à Lui. Accepteriez-vous de vous faire le témoin du dernier hommage rendu à mes frères ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar atmet scharf ein und murmelt:{/n} "Ich spüre etwas Böses in ihrem Tod. Die Seelen der Baleful Howl ruhen nicht, sondern verweilen noch hier auf dem Schlachtfeld. Sie sind nicht beim Allvater. Ich muss sie zu ihm geleitet. Werdet Ihr bezeugen, wie ich meinen Brüdern die letzte Ehre erweise?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heaving in a breath, Ulfar mutters,{/n} "I sense evil in their deaths. The souls of the Baleful Howl are not at rest, but remain here on the battlefield. They are not with the Allfather. I must escort them to him. Will you bear witness to the last honour given to my brothers?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar atmet tief ein und murmelt:{/n} "Ich spüre etwas Böses in ihrem Tod. Die Seelen der Famehungry haben keine Ruhe gefunden, sondern sind noch hier auf dem Schlachtfeld. Sie sind nicht beim Allvater. Ich muss sie zu Ihm geleiten. Wollt Ihr {mf|Zeuge|Zeugin} der letzten Ehre für meine Brüder sein?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, derin bir nefes alarak mırıldanmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ölümlerinde bir kötülük seziyorum. Uğursuz Uluma'nın ruhları son yolculuklarına gitmemiş. Burada, savaş alanındalar. Yücebaba'nın yanında değiller. Onları Yücebaba'ya götürmeliyim. Kardeşlerimin son kez onurlandırılmasına şahit olur musun?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heaving in a breath, Ulfar mutters,{/n} "I sense evil in their deaths. The souls of the Baleful Howl are not at rest, but remain here on the battlefield. They are not with the Allfather. I must escort them to him. Will you bear witness to the last honour given to my brothers?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, derin bir nefes alarak mırıldanmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ölümlerinde bir kötülük seziyorum. Uğursuz Uluma'nın ruhları son yolculuklarına gitmemiş. Burada, bu savaş alanındalar. Yücebaba'nın yanında değiller. Onları Yücebaba'ya götürmeliyim. Kardeşlerime verilen son onura şahit olacak mısın?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
